scripts.postinstall: cp config/scripts/create-react-app.patch node_modules/react-scripts && cd node_modules/react-scripts && git init && git apply create-react-app.patch && cd ../.. && cd node_modules/react-simple-di && yarn && cd ../..

dependenciesComments.js-csp: communicating sequential processes for coordinating remote data sources without race conditions in config/context.js
dependenciesComments.mobx: observables. so far used in the time travel data container
dependenciesComments.phoenix: opens a socket to an elixir/phoenix data channel
dependenciesComments.react: pinned to get rid of isMounted error. diffs the dom
dependenciesComments.react-dom: makes react work on web. (should be kept at the same version as react)
dependenciesComments.react-komposer: composes react containers. should be used only at the top container or so
dependenciesComments.recompose: higher order components the rest of the way down after react-komposer. more modern
